remarks: Deduction form of ~ dvelimc .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2016.)
statement:
dvelimdc.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
dvelimdc.2 $e |- F/ z ph $.
dvelimdc.3 $e |- ( ph -> F/_ x A ) $.
dvelimdc.4 $e |- ( ph -> F/_ z B ) $.
dvelimdc.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( z = y -> A = B ) ) $.
dvelimdc $p |- ( ph -> ( -. A. x x = y -> F/_ x B ) ) $.
